CustomField.description: This field will indicate that this site is allowing Tax-Aide appointments to be available online. This will be set to False and updated when site go online to allow appointments to be scheduled. This field has to be set to True for a site to have the scheduler link to appear on the site locator.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will indicate that this site is allowing Tax-Aide appointments to be available online.
CustomField.label: Publish Appointments Online
